Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.3 Paccayavāra » 9.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.3.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
50.
899Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (sahajātasadisaṃ)…  naanantarapaccayā…  nasamanantarapaccayā…  naaññamaññapaccayā…  naupanissayapaccayā.
